page.title: 02Colerne Village
page.content: The people of Colerne Village lead busy and active lives. Some of them work in the village but a considerable number work outside. In the increasing amount of leisure time we have today there is a wide range of activities for both young and old in the village. Here are some of the clubs for adults: Womens Institute, Skittles, Four Football teams,One Rugby team,Tennis courts,Two clubs, Singers, Luncheon Club, Bell Ringing,Hand Bells and Darts. There are also many clubs for children, they include Cubs, Brownies, Guides, Scouts, Youth Club, Mustard Seed and Pilots (two clubs organised by the church), Swimming Club and Gymnastics. Although people have to go into the nearby towns for some things, there are many amenities in the village.
